utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, let me tell them!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey is gonna be a celebrity guest on a game show!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? Which one?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh! Fish, seaweed, a sunken ship.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Things you find in the ocean, You're gonna be on "Pyramid"!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, that was our favorite game show ever!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Except for "Match game"...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Or "Win, Lose or Draw".

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What did I marry into?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Would you guys want to come down tomorrow and watch me tape the show?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I can't. We're throwing Phoebe a bachelorette party.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, sorry boys, this ride's closing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, and Chandler and I have this stupid college alumni thing. I can't believe you get to meet Donny Osmond.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah-uh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross and I always wanted to be Donny and Marie.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You guys just keep getting cooler and cooler!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, we used to perform for our family and friends.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God, that's right. I blocked that out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: "I'm a little bit country"...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: "...and I'm a little bit rock 'n' roll"!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm leaving you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So weird to see all these people again... Oh my God, look, there's Geoffrey Cleric.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He was roommates with John Rosoff. He went out with Andrea Tamburino. She dumped him for Michael Skloff.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did I go to this school?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, there's Missy Goldberg. You gotta remember her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure, nice.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude. You're married to my sister.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're right, by saying "nice" I'm virtually licking her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I hear she's single again, d'you think I should ask her out?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you asking permission to break the pact?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes please.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey. Hey, check out the flyers for the band. I made 'em on a Macintosh in the computer room!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Awesome, the name really stands out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks to a little something called "Helvetica Bold 24 point"!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Man, we're gonna rock that Asian student union!

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, Missy...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know, our band is playing on Friday.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah. You should come check us out. We're called "Way! No Way!".

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: No way!

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Ross
utterance.content: Way!

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: Right. I'll be there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fresh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Boss!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Mint!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She's gone.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know it. You know, I'm totally gonna ask her out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, I was gonna ask her out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I said it first, bro.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I thought it first, Holmes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, if you did...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Woha! Wait... What are we doing? What we have is too important to mess it up over some girl. I mean, we can get laid anytime we want.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Totally. I had sex in High school...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Me too. I'm good at it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, I'd say we make a pact. Neither of us will go out with Missy Goldberg.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You got it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, so that's Missy Goldberg, Phoebe Cates and Molly Ringwald, who neither of us can go out with.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Those are the pacts!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, and Sheena Easton. But we probably couldn't get her anyway.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, oh... maybe not you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I officially give you permission to break the pact.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you. All right, here I go. Hey, remember how scary it used to be going up to girls in college?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Your hands are shaking.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, and I can't stop sweating.

utterance.speaker: Voice
utterance.content: Five! Four! Three! Applause!

utterance.speaker: Donny Osmond
utterance.content: Yeah! Welcome, it is Soap Opera week here on Pyramid, let's meet our contestants. First, Gene Lester is a database specialist, he's gonna be playing with "Days of Our Life's" star Joey Tribbiani!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know it could be intimidating for regular people to be around celebrities but... relax, I'm just like you! Only better looking and richer.

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: ...should be playing with the star of "General Hospital" Leslie Charleson. Welcome everybody. Good luck to all of you. Let's play Pyramid. All right? Now... we flipped a coin before the show, Gene, you won the toss, so you're gonna start. Which category would you like?

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: I'll take "You crossed the line".

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: You crossed the line. Joey, describe for Gene these things that have lines. Give me 20 seconds on the clock, please. Ready, go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhm... ok. It's a store, like a supermarket. Oh! I see-I see what I did. Yeah, ok, ok, uhm... I'm writing in my...

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Diary.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Noo, more like a notebook... Damn it! Oh, if I'm building an house, the plan isn't called the 'shmoo-print'... Can't say that either? Woha... hey... In high school, I once had sex with a girl right in the middle of the...

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Cafeteria.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! But that is not what they're looking for. OOOH!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you so much for this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, d'you like it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, it's all so elegant! When's the dirty stuff starting?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know, the strippers, and the guys dancing, and you know, pee-pee's flying about.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pheebs, I... there isn't gonna be any flying about! We actually thought we were a little too mature for stuff like that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, ok. I see what you're doing, that's fine. This is all there is, just tea, uh, ok. Hmmmm... raunchy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Seriously Pheebs, it's not gonna be that kind of a party.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really? So this is... this is my big send off in the married life? Rachel this is the only bachelorette party I'm ever gonna have! I've got a big wad of $1s in my purse! Really? I mean, really? It's just tea?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nooo! Phoebe, of course there is more! I mean, I'll just go and talk to Monica and get an ETA on the pee-pee's!

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: Now Gene I must remind you, you need all six of these to stay in the game, all right? Describe for Joey things you find in your refrigerator.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ahaha, he might as well just give us the points.

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: Give me twenty seconds on the clock. Ready? Go!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: You put this in your coffee.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A spoon. Your hands. Your face!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: It's white!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Paper, snow, a ghost!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: It's heavier then milk!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A rock, a dog, the earth.

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Pass!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: You put this on a sandwich.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Salami, anchovies, jam!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: It's white!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Paper, snow, a ghost!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: It's made from eggs!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chickens?

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Pass!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: You put this on a hamburger!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ketchup!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Relish!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Stop!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: Oh, time's up! Joey! You were, uh, almost on a roll there...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: Uh, Gene, you're gonna have a chance to go to the winner circle in the second half. But right now Henrietta you are going to the winner circle to try your luck for ten thousand dollars, right after this, don't go away.

utterance.speaker: Stage Manager
utterance.content: And we're out!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, so we didn't win, but it's fun to play the game, right?

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Hey! I got a kid starting college. I've to get surgery on my knee, you just lost me ten grand!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, wow! I'm so sorry, ok? I promise, we'll do better next time!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Well, I will, because I won't be playing with you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you know, some of those are pretty hard! Like why would there be a ghost in my fridge? . Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, Saturday night!

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: I'd love to!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: So how come it took you so long to ask me out?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, well, uh, this is gonna sound kinda silly, but, do you remember my roommate Chandler Bing?

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: Sure, he was in your "band"?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's been sixteen years but the air quotes still hurt.

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's ok. Uh, anyway, well he and I both really liked you a lot, uhm, but we didn't want anything to jeopardize our friendship, so we kinda made a pact, that neither of us could ask you out!

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, why?

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: Well, Chandler and I used to make out! A lot!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You did?

utterance.speaker: Missy
utterance.content: Yeah. We'd go to the science lab after hours!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: AND ON MY TURF?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, where is this guy, it's been over an hour!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, he's coming from Jersey, he said he would get here as fast as he could!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: It's the police!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh! The police!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: That's right, it's officer Goodbody.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's the matter, officer? Has someone been bad?

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Ooh, boy. You should warn people there's no elevator! I should not have had that Mexican food for lunch.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you gonna be ok, officer, uhm,...

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Goodbody!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ...If-you-say-so.

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: So where's the young lady who I'm supposed to take downtown!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, God!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: All right, somebody show me where to plug in my box, and we'll get this party started! Whaaaa... Here? All right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you kidding?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, look, we did not know that you wanted a stripper so we went to the phonebook and we got the first name we could find!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How old is your phonebook?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, this man is gonna get naked in my apartment!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh God no, I don't wanna see him take his clothes off!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Are you talking about me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, no! I mean, obviously we want to see you take your clothes off! You big piece of eye candy!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Ok, ok, ladies! Can I have your attention, please? Did someone call for the long arm of the law? I should warn you, I have a concealed weapon! I hope you're familiar with the States penal code, ok, ok, enough teasing. Now for some pleasing!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Whoa, whoa, whoa . She cringed!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is how I look when I'm turned on!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: You were talking about me before! Look, I don't need this! I'm outta here! Where's my hat? Look, I've been in this business for a long time!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Shocking!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Now if you just pay me my three hundred dollars, I'll be on my way!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Three hundred dollars, are you kidding?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, that's ok, let's me just get my check book!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, you're not gonna pay him, he didn't do anything!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Didn't do anything? I took a bus all the way from Hoboken. I climbed ... I dunno... like a billion stairs... It's not like I can take them two at a time!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't care. We're not paying you 300 dollars for this.

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Well, look - it's not my fault if you're too uptight to appreciate the male form in all it's glory.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, okay. I'm uptight. Yeah, that's why I don't want to watch a middle aged guy dance around in what I can only assume is a child halloween costume!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: I may have borrowed this from my nephew, but let me assure you, what's underneath ... is all man.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry, did you say all man or old man?

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Oh, you're mean!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, look, officer... uhm Sir...

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Damnit. OH! Big surprise! The hunk of beef has feelings!

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: Ok Henrietta, you've picked Jack and Jill went up the hill.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: My friend Rachel has a kid. I totally know nursery rhymes!

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: Joey describe these things associated with the United States congress. Give me 20 seconds on the clock please. Ready? Go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, .. uh... uh... pass. Pass. Pass. Okay, the little thing that hangs down at the back of your throat.

utterance.speaker: Henrietta
utterance.content: Uvula!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, then pass.

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: O-kay... Henrietta, you didn't get all the points you needed, so that means Gene, you are going to the winners circle to try for ten thousand dollars! And you're gonna be going there with Joey Tribbiani

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You made out with Missy Goldberg. How could you do that, after you promised me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Excuse me. . That didn't make us sound gay at all!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You broke the pact!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross, that was 16 years ago!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That doesn't matter! We're talking about the foundation of our friendship.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I believe the foundation of our friendship was unfortunate hair. All right, look, if we're really gonna do this... it's not like you never broke one of the pacts.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I didn't.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh really!?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: NO!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ADRIENNE TURNER!!

utterance.speaker: Adrienne
utterance.content: Yes?

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Hey Adrienne.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I never did anything with Adrienne Turner.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh please, and you knew how much I liked her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know what... you're talking about.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe we are at a real college party! I have to pee so bad!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: This is so awesome! College guys are so cute!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, you've got a boyfriend!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. But if some guy who looks like Corey Haim wants to kiss me tonight, I'm sooo gonna let them!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look, there's Chandler, you know, that stupid friend of Ross' who said I'm fat. You know I've already lost 4 pounds!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It... You can so totally tell.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I KNOW!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well let's see. Maybe he knows where Ross is. Hey, how's it going .

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aren't you...?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, Rachel. And this is Ross' sister, Monica. We met at Thanksgiving. .

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right. So how're you doing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Bitchin'

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Chandler. It's really nice to see you NOT.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: O-kay. I'll see if I can find Ross.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God Rach. Bean bag chairs.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do NOT let me sit in one of those. We'll be here for days.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen Adrienne, you can't tell Chandler about this.

utterance.speaker: Adrienne
utterance.content: Oh believe me, Ross, I won't be telling anybody about this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Cool!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I didn't know you knew about that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I did and it hurt. That's when I wrote the song: "Betrayal In The Common Room".

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Man... I... I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look it was a lo-o-ong time ago.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, eh. I made out with Adrienne and you made out with Missy. Well I guess we're even.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hmm mmmhm..

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We are even, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Just one more thing. I was so pissed at you that night that I wanted to get back at you. So I thought, who does Ross like the more than anybody?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What did you do to my mom?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not her!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am sooo drunk.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's weird. I've had the same number of beers as you and I don't feel anything at all.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Soo... you girls having fun?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: For your information, ass munch, I've lost four pounds. Maybe even five with all the dancing.

utterance.speaker: Pizza guy
utterance.content: SOMEBODY ORDER A PIZZA?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh THATS ME!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am soo not going to do good on my SATs tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well maybe if you go to school here next year we can totally hang out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah. There is a plan! Why don't I just start taking my smart pills now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, maybe you can get in on a beauty scholarship.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, what a line.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So where are you applying to?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh well, You know, I think it's kinda really important that I go somewhere where there's sun, so I'm sort of... Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm in college and I'm in a band.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah okay.

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: What's the matter? You never saw a 50 year old stripper cry before?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know, it's fine. We'll pay you.

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: No, no, you're right. Who am I kidding? I should have hung up that breakaway jockstrap years ago. What am I gonna do? I mean, this has been my life for thirty two years. Taking my clothes off in front of people is all I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, wait. No there's gotta be something else that you can do. I mean, what skills do you have?

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: I don't know... I can make my pecs dance... I can pick up a dollar bill with my butt cheeks... I can go to that special place inside me where I feel no shame.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So maybe something in an office.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or you could teach stripping. You know, share your gift, pass the torch.

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: You know, actually that's not a bad idea. I can do it out of my apartment. I don't think my mom would mind.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There you go. Okay, do you think you're gonna be okay?

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, yeah... This is so weird. I mean, you never know when it's gonna be your last dance. And I didn't even get a chance to finish it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Finish it!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Your last dance. Do it for us.

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah. He deserves to do the thing he loves one last time.

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Okay, all right... Get ready ladies!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh this is so ho-o-ot!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, no, no, don't stop!

utterance.speaker: Roy
utterance.content: Have to...

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: Well, welcome to the Winner Circle. Joey and Gene, you guys ready?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Donny
utterance.content: Okay. Give me sixty seconds on the clock please... Ready, GO!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Oak, maple, elm, birch...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I-I-I don't know. Types of trees?

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Uhm... Buenos d√≠as, enchilada, por favor...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I'm so sorry. I don't know any Spanish words.

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: A match, a candle...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Things that go "tssst" when you put them out.

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: A torch, a bonfire... uhm, your pee...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Things that burn.

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: "I'd like to go for a walk", uhm "scratch my belly".

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, dude! I think you're losing it.

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Uhm, "I have fur", "I like to bark".

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, oh, oh... What a dog says.

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Pepperoni...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pizza toppings, next!

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Cindy Crawford, Christie Brinkley, Heidi Klum, Claudia Schiffer...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, oh, oh...

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Christie Turlington, Kate Moss...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Girls Chandler could never get?

utterance.speaker: Gene
utterance.content: Supermodels!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, where's Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She and Phoebe took the stripper to the hospital.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you know Chandler kissed Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? When was this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nineteen Eighty Seven. The weekend you guys visited me at school.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! That's wild!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, but it was like a million years ago, so it doesn't matter.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, it matters to me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because... the night you kissed Rachel was the night I kissed Rachel for the very first time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You kissed her that night too?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Two guys in one night? Wow, I thought she became a slut after she got her nose fixed.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Seriously, where did this happen?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, after you told me she was passed out in our room, I went in there to make sure she was all right. She was lying on my bed, all buried in peoples' coats. Well, I went to kiss her on the forehead, you know. But it was so dark, I accidentally got her lips. I started to pull away, but then I felt her start to kiss me back. It was only for a second, but... it was amazing. And now, now I find out that you kissed her first.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh wait... What bed did you say she was on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm pretty sure I put her on my bed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, she was definitely on my bed.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why would I kiss a girl, and then put her on your bed?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, then who was on my bed?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: OH! Oh, oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: NO! No, no!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: YES!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You were under the pile of coats?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I was the pile of coats!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OH MY GOD!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You were my Midnight Mystery Kisser?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You were my first kiss with Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You were my first kiss ever?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What did I marry into?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, crap!
